entry.title: fever
entry.summary:
Author: prideinmymouth

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,253Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: Suddenly, Dick recalls teasing Tim about it, just last month. You haven't really faced Ivy until she gets you with her sex pollen, he'd said. Guess that makes you a virgin, huh, Boy Wonder? It was just a joke, but the deep blush that crept up Tim's neck from beneath the high collar of his cape had told Dick that it was maybe a bit too accurate. ortim is still recovering from the clench when he has a run-in with poison ivy. dick lends a hand.(dicktim week 2025, day two: sex pollen.)
